document_data.name: Sunbolt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Sunbolt''''' was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] that created a burst of sunlight, that struck an area designated by the caster, damaging and temporarily blinding any nearby person or creature.
document_data.Effects: When this spell was cast, a burst of sunlight discharged in an area 60' (9.1 m) in diameter, within an area that was chosen by the caster. Any being caught within this blast was harmed by the blast and was blinded for a matter of seconds, unless they resisted the spell's effects.
document_data.Usage: This spell was unique to the [[elves]] of [[Evermeet]]. The specifications of its casting were a well-kept secret of island realm.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required a small ''[[Sunstone (gem)|sunstone]]'', worth at least 25 [[gp]].
